      • Separate

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> Separate​(java.lang.String stringtoparse)
        This method simply split and get rid of the white spaces. if the user enter go north we will have as a return GO|NORTH
        Parameters:
        stringtoparse - : example go north
        Returns:
        : return an ArrayList look like this |go|north

      • checkInput

        public boolean checkInput​(java.lang.String userInput)
        check if the input is valid or not what makes a valid input ? - the user input can be a One word : special command or Two words : Action or command as first word and Movement or Object as a Second word
        Parameters:
        userInput - : input of the user
        Returns:
        false means Invalid Input | true means Valid Input

      • inputAnalyzer

        public void inputAnalyzer​(java.lang.String userInput,
                          Position playerPosition,
                          Inventory playerInventory,
                          Item playerItem,
                          Player player)
        This function is where the user input is evaluated and tested on. Since I want the user to be able to use potion for example everywhere in the map.
        Parameters:
        userInput - : input of the user
        playerPosition - : position of the player
        playerInventory - : the inventory of the player
        playerItem - : Right hand Item sometimes we want to drop this item or move it from the inventory to the right hand slot
        player - : used to heal the player ..
